title: Neil deGrasse Tysons 8 (Free) Books Every Intelligent Person Sho
description:
A compilation of Neil deGrasse Tyson's list of 8 (free) books that he believes every intelligent person should read - in EPUB, Kindle, and Plain Text formats - all named and sorted neatly. 


Mr. Tyson's recommendations on Reddit:


Article on Open Culture: 
 <a href="
http://www.openculture.com/2011/12/neil_degrasse_tyson_8_books_every_intelligent_person_should_read.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.openculture.com/2011/12/neil_degrasse_tyson_8_books_every_intelligent_person_should_read.html</a>


Wonderful places to get these and other free public domain books:

Project Gutenburg - http://www.gutenberg.org/

Internet Archive -


A very minor compilation on my part, but please enjoy and seed! 

NOTE: I do intend to release larger compilations in the future, namely all the volumes of "The Harvard Classics - Dr. Eliot's Five Foot Shelf".
